name: Mix3

description.en: Returns the result of linearly interpolating between input A and input B by input Percent.
description.zh: 在AB之间进行插值计算，Percent 表示混合的比例。

info.en: The value of input Percent is clamped to the range of 0 to 1
info.zh: 混合比例，取值范围在 [0, 1]，为0时返回 A 的值，为1时返回B的值

main: vec3 main(vec3 InputA, vec3 InputB, float Percent) {
